required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Pulpine and Combination of Pulpine With Polyamidoamine Dendrimer on Remineralization of Carious Affected Human Dentin

detailed_description.textblock: Remineralization of Carious affected dentin by using Pulpine alone and combination of Pulpine with Polyamidoamine Dendrimer.

primary_outcome.measure: Remineralization & increase dentin density that is measured by using Vista Scan Radiography.
primary_outcome.description: Vista scan Radiography used to measure pixel grey value after 6 months.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Combination of pulpine with Polyamidoamine Dendrimer
arm_group.description: Removal of Caries infected dentin from the walls and floor of the cavity and then apply polyamidoamine Denrimer for 30 secs ,then washed out of the cavity followed by placement of Pulpine over affected Dentin.
Removal of Caries infected dentin from the walls and the floor of the cavity followed by application of Pulpine over affected Dentin.

intervention.description: Removal of infected dentin in class I Cavities followed by application of Polyamidoamine Denrimer on caries affected Dentin that is washed out of the cavity after 30 secs then finally place Pulpine .
intervention.arm_group_label: Combination of pulpine with Polyamidoamine Dendrimer

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Presence of at least one class one carious posterior teeth in both left and right side.
- Absence of spontaneous pain, Mobility and tenderness on percussion.
- Radiographically, the preoperative inclusion criteria are, no internal or external resorption and no widening of the periodontal membrane space.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with poor oral Hygiene.
- Evidence of Rampant Caries.
- Teeth with periodontal involvement.
- Poor general health condition.

facility.name: Al-Azhar University, Faculty of Dentistry for Girls

responsible_party.investigator_full_name: Mona Rizk Abo El Wafa Ahmed
